rules_text:
Cytoplast 2 [i](This enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. As you cast a spell, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from this to pay for {1} of that spells cost.)[/i]
As long as there are no counters on this creature, it has flying. [i](This creature can’t be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)[/i]
